protocol.name: P-GSE38878-2
protocol.text: Two weeks-old transgenic seedlings were transferred to MS plate with 20ÂµM estradiol to induce the overexpression of amiR-tor (consequently, repression of AtTOR levels) under the control of an estradiol-(EST) inducible promoter. Identically treated wild-type Col-0 and pER8 empty-vector (EV) transformed seedlings were served as controls. All the genotypes were also transferred to MS plate without EST as an additional control. Seedlings were harvested after 0, 3 and 6 (amiR-tor lines) days.

protocol.name: P-GSE38878-3
protocol.text: Transgenic amiR-tor seeds were surfaced sterilized and germinated in MS plates with hygromycin at continuous light.

protocol.name: P-GSE38878-4
protocol.text: RNA extraction performed using Rneasy Plant MiniKit (Qiagene)

protocol.name: P-GSE38878-5
protocol.text: Labling procedure performed using MessageAmpTM II-Biotin Enhanced Kit

protocol.name: P-GSE38878-8
protocol.text: The data were analyzed with GCRMA (Wu et al., 2004).
